mapper.select: SELECT ei.edcts_ist_no, ei.edcts_ist_dt, ei.edcts_ist_cnt, ei.edcts_cd, ei.edcts_lot_no, ei.edcts_expire, e.prdt_nm, ei.indica_cd FROM edcts e, edcts_ist ei WHERE e.edcts_cd = ei.edcts_cd ORDER BY ei.edcts_ist_no

SELECT ei.edcts_ist_no, ei.edcts_ist_dt, ei.edcts_ist_cnt, ei.edcts_cd, ei.edcts_lot_no, ei.edcts_lot_cnt, e.prdt_nm, ei.edcts_expire FROM edcts e, edcts_ist ei WHERE e.edcts_cd = ei.edcts_cd AND ei.edcts_cd = #{edctsCd} ORDER BY ei.edcts_ist_dt

SELECT DISTINCT p.prod_cnt, p.infer_cnt, p.prcs_status, id.edcts_cd, e.prdt_nm, pid.edcts_expire, i.indica_cd FROM prcs_prog p, indica i, indica_dtl id, edcts e, prcs_insp_dtl pid WHERE p.indica_cd = i.indica_cd AND i.indica_cd = id.indica_cd AND id.edcts_cd = e.edcts_cd AND p.prcs_chk_cd = pid.prcs_chk_cd AND i.now_st = '생산완료' AND p.prcs_status = '포장검사완료' ORDER BY pid.edcts_expire
mapper.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(edcts_ist_no, 5)), 999) + 1) AS "edcts_ist_no", TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd') || TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(edcts_lot_no, 16)), 999) + 1) AS "edcts_lot_no" FROM edcts_ist
INSERT INTO edcts_ist ( edcts_ist_no, edcts_cd, edcts_ist_dt, edcts_ist_cnt, edcts_lot_no, edcts_lot_cnt, edcts_expire, indica_cd ) VALUES ( 'EIST' || #{edctsIstNo}, #{edctsCd}, sysdate, #{edctsIstCnt}, 'EDCTS-L' || #{edctsLotNo}, #{edctsIstCnt}, #{edctsExpire}, #{indicaCd} )
mapper.select:
SELECT ei.edcts_ist_no, ei.edcts_ist_dt, ei.edcts_ist_cnt, ei.edcts_cd, ei.edcts_lot_no, e.prdt_nm, ei.edcts_expire FROM edcts e, edcts_ist ei
e.edcts_cd = ei.edcts_cd
AND ei.edcts_ist_dt >= #{edctsIstDt} and ei.edcts_ist_dt <= #{edctsIstDtEnd} + 1
AND e.prdt_nm LIKE '%' || #{prdtNm} || '%'
ORDER BY ei.edcts_ist_no
mapper.update: UPDATE indica SET now_st = '입고완료' WHERE indica_cd IN ( SELECT i.indica_cd FROM prcs_prog p JOIN indica i ON p.indica_cd = i.indica_cd WHERE p.prcs_status = '포장검사완료' AND i.indica_cd = #{indicaCd} )
